quote: Why bother getting married, going through all the pomp and pageantry, if you didn't think it was going to last? It was far easier to live in sin and not have to deal with the paperwork.
quote_letters: WHY BOTHER GETTING MARRIED GOING THROUGH ALL THE POMP AND PAGEANTRY IF YOU DIDNT THINK IT WAS GOING TO LAST IT WAS FAR EASIER TO LIVE IN SIN AND NOT HAVE TO DEAL WITH THE PAPERWORK
